channel.title: Help plz
channel.description: ok so i download a blank sever and now u know when u log in and it says all this crap like welcome do ::commands how do i change that wat do i put in find to change it plz tell me my 2 problem is how do i put npcs place tell me how to to do that thanks for listening plz help out :)[color=purple][/color]

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @chocothunda chocothunda
item.description:
@chocothunda wrote:

Go into your client.java, and search for what ever it says when you log on. When you find it, just replace it with what you want it to say.

Read full topic
